description: CJ Parker is a bottom-line driven business man with an agenda.  He's been fixing home appliances for long enough to know how to squeeze out the most profit for his effort.  Today he's paid a visit to the home of Jake Zackry to fix his central heating unit.  After assessing the work necessary at Jake's place, he feels he can capitalize on poor Jake's lack of cash flow.When Jake suggests an alternative means of payment. CJ decides it's a worthwhile deal.  Before they can even work out the specifics, Jake is taking CJ's massive, erect cock in his mouth.  After some sensuous sucking, CJ is reciprocating by enjoying Jake's fat dick.  Jake tastes good and CJ knows Jake's ass is eager to be fucked.  They move to Jake's couch for some nice, proper poundage.  Check out CJ as he bangs his client hard, being sure to exact a proper fee for his labor.  It's a bargain deal that Jake can't pass up! Enjoy!
title: Bargain Bang
